subject: Processing of proposals on e-office- reg.
text: HRrfy <74fly <THTif gifeqrUT 3HIY / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (T3v 4Rde7 8 RTTHFf 41T4) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0fl-5 Ta 6, Ad<-10, ETrGT; 7$ fcrf} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ IT/2022 Circular No: 6.28/2022 dated 19th April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/IT/2021/A-App/AE-IE/ Consultant (Comp. No. 88777)} Sub: Processing of proposals on e-office- reg: E-office has been implemented in NHAl and is being used without any trouble: This has also led to improvement in the efficiency in the overall working: To take advantage of the system, it has been decided that proposals initiated from the Project Directors office shall be initiated on the e-office rather than forwarding in physical form. All are requested to take note_ 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (Lt Col Chandan Vatsa, Retd) To: Chief General Manager (Coord.) All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation. Mt U 7 H NHAL Policy Cl Copy
